title: Myleene Klass brings baby son Apollo to work six weeks after birth
text:
Myleene Klass has returned to work just ten weeks after welcoming her third child Apollo.

The presenter shared a snap of herself hosting Classic FM on Sunday alongside a pun-tastic caption, 'We’re Bach! @classicfm'.

The 41-year-old star was seen cradling her baby boy in her arms as she read from her script, proving she can juggle work and motherhood like a pro.

'Superwoman!': Myleene Klass has returned to work just ten weeks after welcoming her third child Apollo, sharing a snap of herself hosting her Classic FM show on Sunday

Myleene was clad in a plunging black top and boasted glamorous make-up and a sleek blow dry.

The mother-of-three, who shares daughters Ava, 12, and Hero, eight, with ex-husband Graham and baby Apollo with her partner Simon Motson, looked totally in her element in the studio.

Her followers were quick to praise the 'super mama', enthusing, 'You are amazing' and 'Superwoman!'.

Another enthused: 'Your heart warming pictures always brings a smile to my face x'.

Cute kid: The mother-of-three, who shares daughters Ava, 12, and Hero, eight, with ex-husband Graham and baby Apollo with her partner Simon Motson, looked totally in her element in the studio

Supportive; Her followers were quick to praise the 'super mama', enthusing, 'You are amazing' and 'Superwoman!'

Myleene also brought Apollo into work for Global’s Make Some Noise Day on Friday, dressing up in matching Where's Wally costumes.

The duo copied the iconic cartoon character by wearing red and white stripped shirts and matching caps.

Completing the look, the mother-and-son duo both wore denim jeans and white trainers, while the radio show host also accessorised with round glasses.

Taking to her Instagram stories, Myleene informed fans that she and Apollo were dressed up for the charity's One Dream One Team event, alongside the staff of Classic FM and Smooth radio.

Double trouble: Myleene also brought Apollo into work for Global’s Make Some Noise Day on Friday, dressing up in matching Where's Wally costumes

Cute! Myleene and Apollo embodied the iconic cartoon character by wearing red-and-white stripped shirts and matching caps

The singer has rarely been spotted without her son since his birth and Myleene has proved herself to be every inch the doting mother - regularly sharing snaps of the youngster on Instagram.

She gave a glimpse into her home life when she shared a video of the tot being 'mesmerised' by his big sister's impressive piano skills.

Dressed in a just a nappy, the newborn was seen sitting on his mother's lap as they watched his sibling play, with Myleene captioning the clip 'mesmerised'.

Last month, Myleene detailed her baby boy's 'complicated' birth in a candid interview with Hello! magazine.

Taking care of him: Kate Garraway helped to look after Apollo while he slept during their party

Uncanny resemblance: Tina Hobley also wore a Where's Wally inspired outfit for the event

She explained: 'My waters broke and I was in the birthing pool. We had a really easy first three hours, to the point that I thought we would all be home by 7pm. But I don't remember what happened next.

'I lost five hours of my life and it was a pretty complicated birth in the end.'

Myleene added that giving birth in her 40s had been 'an extremely different experience' to what she had been through previously.

The host is also mother to daughters Ava, 12, and Hero with ex-husband Graham, while Simon has two children from a previous relationship.
description: Myleene Klass has returned to work just ten weeks after welcoming her third child Apollo.
